Identity.Name: Zuriel, Valyr Shikari
Identity.Basic_Description: A warrior clad in the steel with a red plume. Holding an over the shoulder rifle, with one hand replaced with a prosthetic.

Abilities.Name: Big Game Hunter
Abilities.Ability: When attacking an enemy of size greater than medium, Zureil adds 5 to their skill rating.

Abilities.Name: Grappling Hook
Abilities.Ability: Once per turn as an action; Choose a location in line of site of Zuriel within 10 range and atleast 3 range above or below Zuriel. Zuriel moves to that location.

Abilities.Name: Crushing Grip
Abilities.Ability: Once per turn as an action; if you haven't used an active ability this turn, choose a character smaller than medium within 1 of Zuriel. This character takes 2 distress and cannot disengage.
